title: $:/plugins/telmiger/todonow
author: Thomas Elmiger
description: ToDoNow – a simple, elegant todo list
list: readme try-out usage configuration user-filter support
name: ToDoNow
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "ToDo Addons": { "title": "ToDo Addons", "created": "20170204214629529", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510686", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Every user can implement add-on functionality according to his or her own needs. TiddlyWiki is a flexible and powerful base for that. As an example, the author provides a basic [[Work-Report]] that gives you a nice, printable overview over activities of the last few days. Want to create something new? Contact the author via thomas(.)elmiger(@)gmail(.)com" }, "ToDo Item": { "title": "ToDo Item", "created": "20160820223720059", "creator": "Your Name", "modified": "20190426075510683", "modifier": "Thomas", "priority": "2", "tags": "ToDo", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Motivation: description * Tests/Acceptance criteria" }, "ToDo": { "title": "ToDo", "created": "20170316225737516", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "list": "3 1 2", "modified": "20190426075510691", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "todo-show-priorities": "2", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define list-deadline()
<$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="resultCounter" textafter=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="top"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" setTo="bottom" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="bottom"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" setTo="top" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="title" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/mono-line}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="priority" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}}
    <$list filter=<>> <>
\end <$set name="listfilter" value="[tag[ToDo]tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}!has[draft.of]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}]">
<> <> <>
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" text="deadline" tag="div" class="todo-waiting"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="top" tag="div"> <$wikify name="user-filter1" text="[all[]] {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} +[tag[ToDo]tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}has[todo-deadline]!has[draft.of]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}sort[priority]] +[sort[todo-deadline]]"> <$set name="listfilter" value=<>> <> <$wikify name="user-filter2" text="[all[]] {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} +[tag[ToDo]tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}!has[todo-deadline]!has[draft.of]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}sort[created]] +[sort[priority]]"> <$set name="listfilter" value=<>>
<$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="resultCounter" textafter=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="top" tag="div"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" setTo="bottom" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="bottom" tag="div"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" setTo="top" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="title" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/mono-line}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="priority" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}}
    <$list filter=<>> <>
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##show-list-deadline" text="bottom" tag="div"> <$wikify name="user-filter3" text="[all[]] {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} +[tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}has[todo-deadline]!has[draft.of]tag[ToDo]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}sort[todo-deadline]]"> <$set name="listfilter" value=<>> <> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" text="title" tag="div" class="todo-waiting"> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByTitle}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" text="priority" tag="div" class="todo-waiting"> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByPriority}} <$set name="hint" filter="[tag[ToDo]!has[draft.of]]" emptyValue="show"> <$list filter="""[suffix[show]]"""> <>: <>

" }, "ToDoDone": { "title": "ToDoDone", "created": "20160821091004045", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510673", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$set name="listfilter" value="[tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDoDone}!has[draft.of]tag[ToDoDone]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDoDone}!sort[modified]] +[!sort[todo-done]]">
<> <>
    <$list filter=<> emptyMessage="Nothing has been done yet that matches your criteria."> <>
" }, "ToDoNow": { "title": "ToDoNow", "created": "20160821105639629", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510668", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoMain ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define teBigNewTaskButton(class:"te-big-task") <$wikify name="tt" text=<>><$button tooltip=<> message="tm-new-tiddler" param="ToDo Item" class="te-btn-big te-create $class$">{{$:/core/images/new-button}} \end
!! <> <> <> <> <$set name="listfilter" value="[tag[ToDoNow]!has[draft.of]!sort[modified]]">
    <$list filter=<>> <>
<$set name="hint" filter=<> emptyValue="show"> <$list filter="""[suffix[show]]"""> <>:

<> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/outlook/controls}}
{{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/outlook/display}}

@@.te-noprint <> <> <> <> <> <> @@" }, "Work-Report": { "title": "Work-Report", "created": "20170411185841380", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510662", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "Reporting [[ToDo Addons]] Plugins", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "

What I have been working on <$wikify name="tip" text=<>> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="teBtnHint" btntext="{{$:/core/images/file}}" message="tm-open-window" tooltip=<> tip=<> class="te-btn-big te-first"/>

" }, "$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo": { "title": "$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo", "created": "20190310215056466", "creator": "thomas", "modified": "20190426075510658", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "ToDo" }, "$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDoDone": { "title": "$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDoDone", "created": "20190310215100089", "creator": "thomas", "modified": "20190426075510651", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "ToDoDone" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByPriority": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByPriority", "created": "20170120065032923", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510646", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$wikify name="listfilter" text="[all[]] {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} +[tag[ToDo]tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}!has[draft.of]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}sort[created]] +[sort[todo-deadline]] +[sort[priority]]">
<$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="listrevealCounter" textafter=<>/> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="title" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/mono-line}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="deadline" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action todo-deadline muted"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" $index="show-list-deadline" $value="top"/> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch.svg}}
    <$list filter=<>> <>
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByTitle": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/ToDoByTitle", "created": "20170120065256377", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510642", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$wikify name="listfilter" text="[all[]] {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} +[tag[ToDo]tag{$:/config/listreveal/ProjectSelect/ToDo}!has[draft.of]!tag[ToDoDone]!title[ToDo Item]search{$:/config/listreveal/Search/ToDo}sort[title]]">
<$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="listrevealCounter" textafter=<>/> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="priority" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-list" setTo="deadline" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action todo-deadline muted"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" $index="show-list-deadline" $value="top"/> {{$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch.svg}}
    <$list filter=<>> <>
" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/configuration": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/configuration", "created": "20170628180341282", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510636", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Configuration !!! Priorities In list view, users can select a predefined priority value from a list. Use the following field to edit the list: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" field="list" class=""/> – use single numbers or characters separated by a space. --- !!! Language and display
Show ToDoNow in headless mode <$checkbox tiddler="$:/config/ToDoNow/MainTiddler/headless" field="text" checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> yes (hide title, author, modified date)
Choose your language <$linkcatcher to="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/configuration"> <$select tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/language" field="text"> <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]removeprefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/]sort[]]""" variable="code"> <$wikify name="lang" text="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/<>"> ISO code (language-country)
--- !!! Translations, date and time format # Clone one of the following language tiddlers, set a new ending for the title, e.g. …/de-foo (do not change the rest of the title):
    <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/]]">
  • <>
# Adapt the [[formatting of dates and time|http://tiddlywiki.com/#DateFormat]], translate terms if desired. # Select your newly created language in the dropdown above. --- !!! Task template Enter the text you wish to find in a newly created task: !!!! Author Creator <$edit-text tiddler="ToDo Item" field="creator" class="listreveal-edit-text"/> [[User/Modifier|$:/status/UserName]] – from Control Panel, Info tab <$edit-text tiddler="$:/status/UserName" tag=input class="listreveal-edit-text"/> !!!! Content <$edit-text tiddler="ToDo Item" class="listreveal-edit-text"/> !!!! Preview for new tasks: --- @@.tc-subtitle {{$:/status/UserName}} <>@@ {{ToDo Item}} " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/filter-button": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/filter-button", "created": "20170628185853501", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510630", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "MyMacros $:/tags/Macro ToDoComponents", "todo-done": "20160819011650", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todoUserFilter() <$set name="user-filter" value="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$button to="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/user-filter" class="te-btn-action te-filter" tooltip="Change user filter">{{$:/core/images/close-others-button}} {{$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings!!filter}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##user-filter-on" text="yes"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$button to="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/user-filter" class="te-btn-action te-filter muted" tooltip="Set user filter">{{$:/core/images/close-others-button}} define your own filter \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/headless.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/headless.css", "created": "20180309063437708", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510623", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* ** Headless ToDoNow ** (c) Thomas Elmiger ** """ */ /* ** SectionTitle */ <$reveal state="$:/config/ToDoNow/MainTiddler/headless" type="match" text="yes"> [data-tags*="ToDoMain"] .tc-titlebar, [data-tags*="ToDoMain"] .tc-fold-banner, [data-tags*="ToDoMain"] .tc-subtitle, [data-tags*="ToDoMain"].tc-tiddler-view-frame > div > .tc-tags-wrapper { display: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; } [data-tags*="ToDoMain"].tc-tiddler-frame { padding-top: 0; } /* End """ */" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/icon": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/icon", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "created": "20170224212130411", "modified": "20200219105601430", "tags": "" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/readme", "created": "20170224213250510", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510605", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Installation instructions See http://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#ToDoNow%20Installation !!! ~ToDoNow needs Listreveal ToDoNow extends the power of another plugin called //listreveal// to produce lists. <$list filter="[all[shadows]title[$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme]!has[text]]"> [[Get Listreveal from tid.li/tw5/plugins.html|http://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html#Get%20More%20Plugins]] <$list filter="[all[shadows]title[$:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme]has[text]]"> Read more about Listreveal: $:/plugins/telmiger/listreveal/readme !! Feedback Found a bug or a feature? Report in the [[Google Group|https://groups.google.com/forum/?hl=de#!forum/tiddlywiki]]. --- !! Versions and updating You might want to delete tiddlers that override shadow tiddlers in the plugin. Go to the control panel, fold out the plugin using the down-arrow icon and open the contents tab. Tiddlers in bold are o.k. Tiddlers with names in normal style are dangerous and you might have to delete them to get the new version from the updated plugin. !!! Version 1.2.15 * Fixed a bug on node.js, where ~$:/state tiddlers disappear on reload . * Added support tab and other minor improvements. !!! Version 1.2.9 * Minor redesign with better icons, context sensitive colours, less whitespace and additional configuration options: ** hide the header of ToDoNow ** check and adjust author/creator info and task template ** translate all text, date and time formats on ToDoNow via translation tiddlers *** you can leave the translation empty to save the space * independent save button (no longer a duplication of the core save button, so [[adding an accesskey to the core version|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/tiddlywiki/OJQ0yRq4zog/DqCXRmWxAgAJ]] should not be a problem anymore) * listreveal updated to version 0.3.21 * reminders updated to version 0.1.6 Special thanks to Surya, Mark, Jasper and Josiah for feedback and suggestions! !!! Version 1.0.9 * Quotes – single ' and double " – can be used in task titles now (do not put " at the end though)
//hint: a prime ′ is not a straight-apostrophe ' or a printer's apostrophe ’// * listreveal updated to version 0.2.1 * reminders updated to version 0.1.4 !!! Version 1.0.8 * User filters are back – better than ever * Configuration info update – how to translate/adjust date and time formats !!! Version 1.0.7 * New Addon: Outlook ** Outlook shows tasks for today/tomorrow/next 7 days – comes with translations en, de, dk * Support for new/updated Plugins ** Reminders: https://tid.li/tw5/plugins.html ** [[Datepicker|http://kixam.github.io/TW5-datePicker/]] 0.5.2 and moments.js [[(info)|http://momentjs.com/]] 2.18.1 by kixam ** [[Checklist by Tony Grosinger|http://grosinger.net/tw5-checklist/]] in the great new version 0.0.14 *** hint: use tab and space bar to navigate, activate and delete subtasks *** (removed unnecessary CSS) * Download options ** Bundles for simple to sophisticated solutions ** Demo/download page for the complete solution: https://tid.li/tw5/tdn.html * Plugin info: new tabs for configuration and usage * Danish translation by Birthe (thank you!) * Documentation update * and possibly other cool features I forgot to list here " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/report": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/report", "created": "20170413053458131", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510729", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define workReportList() <$wikify name="listfilter" text="<>">
    <$list filter=<>> <>
\end \define workReportListItem() <$set name="todoTitle" value={{!!title}}>
  • <$list filter="[tag[ToDoDone]has:value[todo-done]] [tag[ToDoArchive]has:value[todo-done]]"> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/> <$list filter="[tag[ToDoDone]has:value[todo-done]] [tag[ToDoArchive]has:value[todo-done]]"> <$wikify name="tpl" text=<> > ~~<$view field="todo-done" format="date" template=<>/>~~ <$view field="todo-done" format="date" template="0hh:0mm"/> <$list filter="[tag[ToDo]] [tag[ToDoNow]]"> <> <> <> <$list filter="[tag[ToDoArchive]]"> <> <> <$wikify name="cl" text=<> > <$wikify name="tt" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealButton" title=<> tooltip=<> close=<>/> <$wikify name="tpl" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealContent" title=<> mode="block" datetime=<>/> <" end:"">>
    • \end \define reportDays(days:7) <$set name="reportDaysTiddler" value="$:/temp/report-days"> <$wikify name="placeholder" text=<> >
    <$edit-text tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus="true" placeholder=<> default="1" size="5"/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$wikify name="reset" text=<> > <$button tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
    \end \define reportProjectSelect() <$wikify name="tagfilter" text="$(tagfilter)$ +[tags[]sort[title]]">
    <$select tiddler='$:/state/report-project'> <$list filter=<>>
    \end \define reportProjectSort() <$wikify name="listfilter" text="$(tagfilter)$">
    <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" text="modified"> <$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="listrevealCounter" textafter=<>/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" text="priority"> <$wikify name="after" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="resultCounter" textafter=<>/> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" text="modified"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" setTo="modified" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" text="priority"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$button set="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings##sort-report" setTo="priority" tooltip=<> class="te-btn-action muted"> {{$:/core/images/star-filled}}
    \end \define sortReportPriority() <$set name="tagfilter" filter="[tag{$:/state/report-project}]" value="[days:modified[<>]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!prefix[Work-Report]tag[<>]sort[modified]sort[todo-done]] +[sort[priority]]" emptyValue="[days:modified[<>]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!prefix[Work-Report]sort[modified]sort[todo-done]] +[sort[priority]]"> <>
    <> <>
    \end \define sortReportModified() <$set name="tagfilter" filter="[tag{$:/state/report-project}]" value="[days:modified[<>]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!prefix[Work-Report]tag[<>]sort[todo-done]] +[sort[modified]]" emptyValue="[days:modified[<>]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!prefix[Work-Report]sort[todo-done]] +[sort[modified]]"> <>
    <> <>
    \end " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings", "text": " sort-list: deadline sort-report: priority user-filter-on: no show-list-deadline: top", "type": "application/x-tiddler-dictionary", "created": "20170118225144126", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "filter": "", "list": "1 2 3 A B", "modified": "20200219105601412", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "MyMacros ToDoComponents" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/support": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/support", "created": "20190310223735665", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510721", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{$:/plugins/telmiger/support}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/tdn.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/tdn.css", "created": "20160809144727235", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510713", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* report 2.0 */ .tdn-report-search { display: inline; float: left; margin-bottom: 10px; } .tdn-report.lr-search { float: right; margin-top: 0; font-size: 1em; } /* sections, headings and search */ .todo-now, .todo-waiting, .todo-done { width: 100%; } .tc-tiddler-body .todo-now h2 { display: flex; margin-top: 0; justify-content: space-between; } .tc-tiddler-body .todo-waiting h2, .tc-tiddler-body .todo-done h2 { display: flex; margin-top: 3rem; justify-content: space-between; } .todo-waiting h2, .todo-done h2 { font-weight: 300; } .lr-search { font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 300; margin-bottom: .5rem; } .lr-project-search, .lr-search .tc-search { font-size: 0.875rem; } .lr-search-count { width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: baseline; border-top: 1px solid; border-color: <>; margin: 0 0.25rem 1px 0; padding: 0 0.25rem 0.125rem; background-color: <>; color: <>; } .lr-search-counter { width: 48%; flex-grow: 1; text-align: left; } /* lists */ .todo-now .te-list > li { border-color: <>; } .todo-move-list, .todo-sort-list { width: 26%; flex-grow: 1; } .todo-sort-list { text-align: right; } .todo-sort-list .te-btn-action.todo-deadline { display: unset; background: none; } .todo-sort-list .muted svg { fill: <>; } /* adjustments to button colors*/ .todo-now .te-btn-action.te-prio:hover, .todo-item .te-btn-action.te-prio:hover { background-color: <>; border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } /* tips */ .todo-deadline .todo-deadline-time { position: absolute; background-color: <>; left: 4.5em; top: -1em; padding: 0 3px 0 3px; border: 1px solid #cccccc; border-radius: 3px; display: none; } .todo-deadline:hover .todo-deadline-time { display: unset; } /* buttons */ body .todo-btn-invisible { border: none; border-radius: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: none; margin-right: .5rem; padding-top: .125rem; } .te-list .todo-btn-invisible:hover { background: none; } .te-list .todo-btn-invisible:hover::before { content: "✓"; color: <>; position: absolute; z-index: 99; font-size: 2.66em; margin: -19px 0 0 -7px; opacity: 0.8; -webkit-animation: checkitem 0.5s ease 0s running; animation-name: checkitem; animation-duration: 0.5s; animation-timing-function: ease; animation-delay: 0s; animation-iteration-count: 1; animation-direction: normal; } .te-list .tc-image-done-button { height: 1.25em; width: 1.25em; margin-right: 1em; position: relative; top: 4px; left: 3px; } .todo .tc-dirty-indicator { margin-right: 0.6em; height: 1.25em; width: 1.25em; } .todo-item .te-btn-action .tc-image-folder, .todo-item .te-btn-action .tc-image-refresh-button { margin-top: -.33rem; } /* todo animation */ @keyframes checkitem { 0% { font-size: 100em; opacity: 0; } 70.0% { font-size: 5em; opacity: 0.75; } 100.0% { font-size: 1.75em; opacity: 1; } } @-webkit-keyframes checkitem { 0% { font-size: 100em; opacity: 0; } 70.0% { font-size: 5em; opacity: 0.75; } 100.0% { font-size: 1.75em; opacity: 1; } } /* very small screens */ @media (max-width: 500px) { .todo-btn-invisible { margin-left: -5px; } } " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/tdn": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/tdn", "created": "20160817210934598", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510717", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "MyMacros $:/tags/Macro ToDoComponents", "todo-done": "20160819011650", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define todonowShowListItem(tagExclude:"")
  • <$set name="todoTitle" value={{!!title}}> <$macrocall $name="todoBtnDone" add-remove="ToDoDone -ToDoNow -ToDo"/> <$link to={{!!title}} tooltip={{!!description}}><$view field="title"/> <> <> <> <> <$list filter="[all[current]tag[ToDoNow]]"> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$wikify name="tip" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="teBtnTagListops" btntext="{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}" add-remove="ToDo -ToDoNow" tooltip=<> tip=<> class="muted"/> <$list filter="[all[current]tag[ToDo]]"> <> <$wikify name="cl" text=<> > <$wikify name="tt" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealButton" title=<> tooltip=<> close=<>/> <$wikify name="tpl" text=<> > <$macrocall $name="listrevealContent" title=<> datetime=<> tagExclude="""$tagExclude$"""/>

tooltip=<> tip=<>/> \end \define todoBtnDone(add-remove,class:"") <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$wikify name="timestamp" text=<>> <$button class="""todo-btn-invisible $class$""" tooltip=<> > <$action-listops $tags="$add-remove$"/> <$action-listops $field="todo-done" $subfilter="[list{!!todo-done}] +[prepend]"/> {{$:/core/images/full-screen-button}} \end \define todoBtnPriority(class:"") <$set name="tid" value=<>> <$wikify name="tt" text=<>> <$macrocall $name="teBtnPrioPopup" tiddler=<> btntext="{{$:/core/images/star-filled}}" priority={{!!priority}} prioritylist="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" tooltip=<> class="$class$"/> \end \define todoShowDeadline() <$wikify name="tpl" text=<> > <$view field="todo-deadline" format="date" template=<>/> <> <$view field="todo-deadline" format="date" template="0hh:0mm"/> \end \define todoBtnRemoveDeadline(class:"",icon:"$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch.svg") <$wikify name="tip" text="<>"> <$button class="""te-btn-action todo-deadline $class$"""> <> <$action-deletefield $field="todo-deadline"/> <$macrocall $name="teBtnIcons" label=<> icon="""$icon$""" hovericon="$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch-stop.svg"/> \end \define todoBtnDeadline(class:"") <$set name="checkPlugin" filter="[[$:/plugins/kixam/datepicker]get[title]removesuffix[$:/plugins/kixam/datepicker]]" value="todoBtnSetDeadline" emptyValue="noplugin"> <$set name="output" filter="[all[current]has:value[todo-deadline]]" value="todoBtnChangeDeadline" emptyValue=<> > <$macrocall $name=<> class="""$class$"""/> \end \define todoBtnSetDeadline(class:"",icon:"$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch-empty.svg") <> <$edit-date field="todo-deadline" icon="""$icon$""" tag="span" showTime use24hour firstDay=1 /><$list filter="[days:todo-deadline[0]]">@@.urgent.today <>@@<$list filter="[!days:todo-deadline[-1]]">@@.urgent.late <>@@ \end \define todoBtnChangeDeadline(class:"",icon:"$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch.svg") <$set name="checkPlugin" filter="[[$:/plugins/kixam/datepicker]get[title]removesuffix[$:/plugins/kixam/datepicker]]" value="ShowBtnChangeDeadline" emptyValue="noplugin"> <$macrocall $name=<>/> <$wikify name="tid" text="<>"> <$list filter="[!tag[ToDoDone]!tag[ToDoArchive]]"> <$macrocall $name="lateCheck" tiddler=<> deadline-field="todo-deadline"/> <$macrocall $name="dayCheck" tiddler=<> deadline-field="todo-deadline"/> \end \define ShowBtnChangeDeadline(class:"",icon:"$:/plugins/telmiger/lib/icons/stopwatch.svg") <> <$edit-date field="todo-deadline" icon="""$icon$""" tag=div showTime use24hour firstDay=1 /> \end \define lateCheck(tiddler,deadline-field) <$vars tiddler="""$tiddler$""" deadline="""$deadline-field$"""> <$wikify name="checkfilter" text="""<>$tiddler$]!days:$deadline-field$[-1<>"""> <$list filter=<>>@@.urgent.late <>@@ \end \define dayCheck(tiddler,deadline-field) <$vars tiddler="""$tiddler$""" deadline="""$deadline-field$"""> <$wikify name="checkfilter" text="""<>$tiddler$]days:$deadline-field$[0<>"""> <$list filter=<>>@@.urgent.today <>@@ \end \define noplugin(class:"do nothing, plugin missing ",icon) \end " },       <>
    <$list filter="[all[current]tag[ToDoDone]] [all[current]tag[ToDoArchive]]">

    " }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/try-out": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/try-out", "created": "20170514130740009", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510705", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "{{ToDoNow}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/usage": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/usage", "created": "20170628175727847", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510700", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!!! Usage ToDoNow is meant to be a //simple// todo list for everyone – also for you. Explore! Hover over buttons to get a hint for their function. Klick to try them out. !!! Configuration On the [[configuration|$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/configuration]] tab you can adjust the settings for: * priority values * language * template for ~ToDo items Additional settings can be found on the tab [[user-filter|$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/user-filter]]. !!! How to change translations, date and time format # Clone one of the plugin’s language tiddlers, set a new ending for the title, e.g. …/en-foo (do not change the rest of the title). So if you clone $:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/en-GB, call your version e.g. $:/plugins/telmiger/lib/languages/en-foo # In this tiddler you can change every definition to the right of the colon (:), e.g. in `date-deadline-tmpl: 0DD.0MM.YYYY` to the text/format you want. # Choose your own «language» on the [[configuration|$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/configuration]] tab of the plugin: en-foo !!! Addons {{ToDo Addons}}" }, "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/user-filter": { "title": "$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/user-filter", "created": "20170516112945356", "creator": "Thomas Elmiger", "modified": "20190426075510696", "modifier": "Thomas Elmiger", "tags": "ToDoComponents", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "!! Define your own filter You can filter tasks to show in the ToDo section of the list view:
    <$vars uf="$:/temp/tdn/user-filter"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> default="" type="search" tag="input" size="60" class=""/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$wikify name="reset" text=<> > <$button tooltip=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" filter="" /> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" filter={{$:/temp/tdn/user-filter}}/> Use filter
    The user-filter expression is saved in the //filter// field of the [[settings tiddler|$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings]]. !!! Filter examples Usually filter conditions will start with a plus sign `+` as your criteria are additional to a preceding filter `"[all[]] …"`. You could use … * `+[!tag[TagName]]` to //exclude// all tiddlers tagged with `TagName`. – Remove the exclamation mark `!` to //include// only tiddlers with that tag. * `+[field:priority[1]] [field:priority[2]]` to show only priorities 1 and 2. * `+[!field:priority[3]]` to hide priority 3. * `+[tag[Themes]tag[Projects]]` to find tasks tagged with //Themes// and //Projects//. * `+[days:created[-180]!days:created[-90]]` to find tasks created about 3 to 6 months back. !!! Filter button <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/telmiger/todonow/settings" field="text" index="user-filter-on" checked="yes" unchecked="no"> Always show the filter button on ToDoNow. (As long as a filter is set, the button will be visible anyway.)" } } }
